name: Crazy Coins Pusher
description:
Crazy Coin Pusher is a free vegas style coin pusher game. It will brings you lots of fun, just like what you do in carnival !

How to play
1. Tap to drop gold coins onto the pusher and collect your coins by pushing coins off the table. Be careful not to push coins over the sides !
2. The emergence of special chip coins can help you get more coins !
3. Using the wall and shake skills in the game can help you get more coins !
4. When your coins happen to fall into two slots circles, the slot machine will spin and you can get more coins !

Features
One tap and easy control!
Beautiful graphics and animation!
Addictive gameplay!
Excellent time killer game!

Download and play the most exciting coin pusher game NOW!

NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT OF ANY KIND IS NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN ANY GAME.

These games are intended for adult audiences and do not offer real money gambling or any opportunities to win real money or prizes. Success within this game does not imply future success at real money gambling.
Apple does not sponsor, nor is any way affiliated with Crazy coin pusher and/or the sweepstakes prizes.
